statements: SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM user_accounts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_accounts;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_accounts
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM user_accounts
SELECT username, created_at FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, permission_level FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 3 AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT id, permission_level FROM permissions WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE r.role_name = 'admin';
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ur.role_id) AS role_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING role_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id

SELECT user_id, username, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id

SELECT user_id, username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE is_admin = TRUE;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles_mapping ON users.user_id = user_roles_mapping.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_roles_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE is_admin = TRUE
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles_mapping urm ON u.user_id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON urm.role_id = r.role_id
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions_mapping upm ON u.user_id = upm.user_id JOIN user_permissions p ON upm.permission_id = p.permission_id ORDER BY u.username
